mapper.insert: insert into ko_review(review_no, review_title, review_content, review_image, review_regdate, review_grade, res_no, id) values(ko_review_seq.nextval, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewImage}, sysdate, #{reviewGrade}, #{restaurantVO.resNo}, #{memberVO.id})
mapper.select: select a.* , b.res_no from (select row_number() over(order by review_no desc) as rnum, review_no, review_title, review_content, review_image, review_regdate, review_grade, res_no, id from KO_REVIEW where res_no=#{resNo}) a, ko_restaurant b where a.res_no = b.res_no and rnum between #{getStartRowNumber} and #{getEndRowNumber}
